person.persName: Arthur Gardner (Graves County, Kentucky, saddler, postmaster, railroad agent, and trader)

body.p: Graves County, Kentucky, postmaster, saddler, railroad agent, and trader. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth J. Hughes Gardner. Father of Ava Gardner, Lula Gardner, Estella Gardner, and Stephen A.D. Gardner. Postmaster for Leander in Graves County from May 28, 1850, to January 13, 1851. Saddler in Graves County in 1850. Household owned ten enslaved persons in Graves County in 1850. Railroad agent in Graves County in 1860. Trader in Graves County in 1863.
